Class AbstractController

java.lang.Object
io.fusion.air.microservice.server.controllers.AbstractController
Direct Known Subclasses:
CartControllerImpl, ConfigController, CountryControllerImpl, EchoController, HealthController, OrderControllerImpl, PaymentControllerImpl, ProductControllerImpl, ResourceController, TokenController
public abstract class AbstractController extends Object
Abstract Controller for the Service All Other Controllers can extend from this Base Controller which sets the URL base
Version:
1.0
Author:
arafkarsh
